As Quickstride, Uproar and Rattrap get ready to leave the meeting room, to =
go about their work, Uproar stops unexpectedly and begins sneezing, dispers=
ing energon at the same time.  This alarms Rattrap and Quickstride.

"Uh oh=
h, I saw that..  Don't tell me...  Ohh don't tell me you got what I think y=
ou got."

Rattrap moves away from Uproar as does Quickstride, who are reluc=
tant only because they didn't want to catch Uproars affliction. The large c=
at starts sneezing again as energon is dispersed.

"Sorry guys, wow, where =
the pit did this come from?  I don't remember being anywhere near anyone wi=
th... Uhh ohh, guys, back up!  AHHCHOO!"

Again another burst of energon co=
mes out of his nostrills.

Quickstride now looks over to Legacy.

" We have=
n't seen this since Rhinox contracted it, a while ago... Poor guy, he was p=
retty hefty, and that virus took alot out of him..  I can imagine what it's=
 gonna do ta Uproar, he's a lot smaller than Rhinox, and I dunno how much h=
is body is gonna handle and for how long."

Rattrap quickly jumps in.

"We =
gotta get that cat ta Bump ASAP.  Prefferably in Isolation, so the rest of =
us don't catch it."  

Uproar nodds.

"Yeah, he's right, can't risk anyone =
else gettn' sick..  Maaaan this bites."

He crinkles up his muzzle as Quick=
stride and Rattrap move quickly out of the way.  They barely missed getting=
 sneezed on as their comrade is now stuck with a persistant sneezing fit.

=
